sentences.en: Actually , my snowboarding boots are your boots.
sentences.cn: 我的滑雪靴跟你的一样(杰夫 · 格登)

sentences.en: Can you be a snowboarding expert it?
sentences.cn: 你能成为一名滑板滑雪的专家 吗 ?
因此, 单板滑雪开始脱离雪道.

sentences.en: I get a rush from snowboarding.
sentences.cn: 滑板能够带给我一种快感.

sentences.en: New snowboarding facilities should attract more people.
sentences.cn: 新建的滑雪板运动设施应该会吸引更多的人。

sentences.en: One of the greatest joys of snowboarding is performing tricks.
sentences.cn: 滑雪板运动中,最大的乐趣之一就是表演花样动作.

sentences.en: Smith says he's also looking into building a BLOCK terrain park and snowboarding school there.
sentences.cn: 史密斯说他现在在考虑建立BLOCK的地面公园和滑雪学校.

sentences.en: Snowboarding became an Olympic sport in 1998.
sentences.cn: 滑雪板运动在1998年成为奥运会比赛项目.

sentences.en: Snowboarding boots are constructed from plastics like nylon.
sentences.cn: 滑雪板靴是由塑料材料制成的,比如尼龙.

sentences.en: Snowboarding is a really fun sport.
sentences.cn: 滑板滑雪是项很有意思的运动.

sentences.en: Snowboarding is now an Olympic sport.
sentences.cn: 滑雪板运动现在是奥运会比赛项目。

sentences.en: Vladimir Radmanovic was out 24 games after separating his shoulder snowboarding.
sentences.cn: 拉的马诺维奇也因肩伤错过了24场比赛.
我们看了一场滑板滑雪比赛.
我们正在看滑板滑雪比赛.

sentences.en: You don't need a new snowboarding cap. Justin: Aw, Ma!
sentences.cn: 你不需要新的滑雪板帽. 贾斯丁: 喔, 妈!

trans.tran_cn: 单板滑雪，滑板滑雪，滑雪板
trans.tran_en: the sport of going down snow-covered hills on a snowboard
